newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan central bank to inject funds on Friday.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan central bank to inject funds on Friday.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank will inject funds into the banking system on Friday through open market operations, a bank official said.
The bank, through bills finance companies, will execute within-30-day open market operations on qualified securities instruments offered by interested financial institutions, the official said.
Bids will be closed at 10:30 a.m. (0230 GMT).
The funds will be released according to actual demand, the official said.
